summary: Encapsulates configuration options that define how training and evaluation data are supplied to a model, including dataset locations, preprocessing settings, and related parameters. Designed to be parsed from the command line via a Hugging Face argument parser, it provides a structured way to pass data-related settings into training scripts.
business_intent: Enable users to conveniently specify and manage data input parameters for model training and evaluation, facilitating reproducible experiments and flexible commandâ€‘line configuration.
